</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: 
inline">(b)&#160;&#160; &#160;</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt" 
align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
DISPLAY: inline">Provision for power agreements</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">In February 2015, the Company entered into certain agreements 
necessary to secure long-term power requirements for the Phoenix Gold 
Project.&#160;&#160;The cost to the Company as a result of these agreements is 
dependent on a number of factors including the cost to construct the power 
infrastructure upgrades and power load consumption.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">During the three months ended June 30, 2015, the Company 
initiated and completed power infrastructure upgrade activities which triggered 
the recognition of a liability and a corresponding asset.&#160;&#160;The current
estimated value of the future liability as of June 30, 2015 is $6,600 (December 
31, 2014 - $nil).</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: 
inline">(c)&#160; &#160;&#160;</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"
align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
DISPLAY: inline">Flow-through share premium liability</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Flow-through share liability consists of the remaining 
liability (premium) of the flow-through shares issued on April 9, 
2015.&#160;&#160;Flow-through share premium liability is recognized in deferred 
tax recoveries when the related qualifying resource expenditures are 
incurred.&#160;&#160;The Company recognized $1,146 of deferred tax recoveries 
related to the flow-through share premium liability during the three months 
ended June 30, 2015.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline"><font 
style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">14.</font></font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">WARRANT 
LIABILITY </font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times 
New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">As discussed in Note 12 &#8211; Long Term Debt, the 
Company entered into a secured loan facility with CPPIB for US$50,000 on May 12,
2015.&#160;&#160;As part of the loan facility the Company granted CPPIB 
10,000,000 Warrants exercisable on or before May 12, 2020, at a price of $1.715 
per Warrant.</font></div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
DISPLAY: inline">The following is a summary of the changes in the 
Company&#8217;s Warrant Liability:</font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt" align="left">
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="90%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr>
<td valign="bottom" width="85%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 4px double; BORDER-
BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160; </font></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 4px double; BORDER-
BOTTOM: black 2px solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160;</font></td>
<td colspan="2" valign="bottom" width="13%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 4px double;
BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT:

<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: 
inline">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Other fair value adjustments represent the net effect of 
changes in the variables included in the Black-Scholes option pricing model 
between the date of initial fair-value recognition and the reporting date. These
variables include share price, risk-free interest rate, expected stock price 
volatility, expected life of the Warrants, and expected dividend
yield.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>

<div id="PGBRK" style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-
INDENT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="center"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">- <font 
style="FONT-STYLE: normal">15 </font></font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; 
DISPLAY: inline">-</font></font></div>
</div>
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160; </font></div>
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160; </font></div>
<div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">RUBICON MINERALS CORPORATION</font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Notes to the Consolidated Financial Statements 
(Unaudited)</font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">June 30, 2015 and 2014</font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">(in Canadian Dollars, in thousands except 
for share data)</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
<div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline"><font 
style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">15.</font></font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">GOLD STREAM 
FACILITY</font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times 
New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">On February 10, 2014, the Company entered into a 
Gold Stream Facility with Royal Gold pursuant to which the Company agreed to 
sell an equivalent of 6.30% of future gold production from the Phoenix Gold 
Project to Royal Gold to a maximum of 135,000 ounces of gold and then 3.15% of 
future gold production thereafter. In consideration, Royal Gold agreed to pay 
US$75,000 to the Company as a deposit on the purchase price.</font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">As at June 30, 2015, the Company had received the full 
US$75,000 deposit.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Upon delivery of gold to Royal Gold, Royal Gold will pay the 
current market price on the first 135,000 ounces by way of allocation of the 
deposit to satisfy 75% of the payment.&#160;&#160;In addition, the Company will 
receive a cash payment equal to 25% of the spot gold price. After the deposit 
has been drawn down to $nil, Royal Gold will make a cash payment for all future 
gold deliveries equal to 25% of the spot gold price.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Upon expiry of the 40-year term of the agreement, any balance 
remaining unpaid, relating to the US$75,000 deposit, shall be refunded to Royal 
Gold.&#160;&#160;The Gold Stream Facility continues to the end of the mine 
life.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Repayment of the deposit is secured against the assets of the 
Phoenix Gold Project. Rubicon has the right to raise up to US$100,000 of debt 
financing that will rank in priority to the Gold Stream Facility deposit. In the
event that Royal Gold&#8217;s interest is subordinated to more than US$50,000 of
debt, Royal Gold&#8217;s additional cash payments for gold deliveries will be 
reduced from 25% of market price by 5.4% multiplied by the amount of the senior 
debt outstanding and drawn in excess of US$50,000 divided by 
US$50,000.&#160;&#160;As discussed in Note 12 &#8211; Long Term Debt, the 
Company entered into a debt financing with CPPIB for US$50,000 that qualified as
ranking in priority to the Gold Stream Facility deposit.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
DISPLAY: inline">The following is a summary of the changes in the 
Company&#8217;s Gold Stream Facility:</font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt" align="left">
<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="90%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr>
<td valign="bottom" width="88%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 4px double; BORDER-
BOTTOM: black 2px solid"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160; </font></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="1%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 4px double; BORDER-
BOTTOM: black 2px solid; PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160;</font></td>
<td colspan="2" valign="bottom" width="10%" style="BORDER-TOP: black 4px double;
BORDER-BOTTOM: black 2px solid; TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT:

</td>

</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY:
inline">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Other fair value adjustments represent the net effect on the 
Gold Stream Facility of changes in the variables included in the Company&#8217;s
valuation model between the date of receipt of funds and the reporting date. 
These variables include loan accretion, risk free interest rate, forward gold 
price forecast, Company specific credit spread and expected gold ounces to be 
delivered.&#160;&#160;For the three and six months ended June 30, 2015 other 
fair value adjustments include accretion of $1,858 and $3,677 (June 30, 2014 - 
$159 and $768).&#160;&#160;As the Gold Stream Facility is denominated in US 
dollars, foreign exchange represents the effect of the change in the CAD/USD 
exchange rate between the date of receipt of funds and the reporting 
date.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>

<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: 
inline">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">As of June 30, 2015 the Company has not repaid any of the 
deposit to Royal Gold.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>

FAMILY: times new roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160;</font></td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">During the three and six months ended June 30, 2015, the 
Company recorded share-based payments expense, related to stock options, of $604
and $1,241 (June 30, 2014 - $493 and $733), in addition, share-based payments of
$43 and $89 (June 30, 2014 - $20 and $55) were capitalized to exploration and 
evaluation assets. The fair value of each stock option is accounted for over the
vesting period of the stock options and the related credit is included in share-
based payments.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">The risk-free interest rate assumption is based on Canadian 
government bonds with terms matching the expected life of the stock options. The
expected volatility assumption is based on the historical volatility of the 
Company&#8217;s share price on the Toronto Stock Exchange over the recent past 
period equal to the expected life of the stock options.</font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>

<div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;

DISPLAY: inline">RUBICON MINERALS CORPORATION</font></font></font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline"><font

the Consolidated Financial Statements (Unaudited)</font></font></font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline"><font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">June 30, 
2015 and 2014</font></font></font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline"><font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-STYLE: italic; 
DISPLAY: inline">(in Canadian Dollars, in thousands except for share 
data)</font></font></font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; 
DISPLAY: inline"><br>
</font></font></div>

<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="left">&#160;</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="left">
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; 
DISPLAY: inline">16.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">SHARE CAPITAL <font style="FONT-STYLE: 
italic; DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: 
normal">(continued)</font></font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">The 
weighted average measurement date fair value of options granted during the six 
months ended June 30, 2015 is $0.76 (June 30, 2014 - $0.52).</font></div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Option pricing models require the input of highly subjective 
assumptions, particularly as to the expected price volatility of the share 
price.&#160;&#160;Changes in these assumptions can materially affect the fair 
value estimate and therefore it is management&#8217;s view that the existing 
models do not necessarily provide a single reliable measure of the fair value of
the Company&#8217;s stock option grants.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman; DISPLAY: inline">Performance Stock Options</font></div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">On June 6, 2012, the Company granted 1,400,000 stock options to
an executive officer. Of the options granted, 400,000 stock options vested 
within 1 year of the grant date and the remaining 1,000,000 stock options (the 
&#8220;Performance Stock Options&#8221;) vest based on milestones related to 
certain of the Company&#8217;s objectives. As of June 30, 2015 500,000 of these 
Performance Stock Options are vested and 500,000 remain unvested. Subject to the
vesting of these Performance Stock Options, the Performance Stock Options are 
exercisable at $2.94 per share for a period of five years from the date of 
grant.&#160;&#160;These stock options are included in all the above stock option
tables.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">The fair value of the Performance Stock Options granted are 
estimated at the grant date using the Black Scholes option pricing model with 
the expense being recognized over the expected vesting term. The amount of 
expense recognized to subsequent period ends will be adjusted for any change in 
the estimated vesting period and any change to this expense will be recorded in 
the period of the change. The expense recorded relating to the Performance Stock
Options during the three and six months ended June 30, 2015 is $37 and $95 (June
30, 2014 - $57 and $115).</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">

<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">The amount of cash payable under these stock appreciation 
rights will be an amount that will achieve the same after tax receipt of funds 
as the exercise of an equivalent number of stock options, followed by an 
immediate sale of the stock.&#160;&#160;At June 30, 2015, the total liability 
outstanding for SARs calculated using the Black-Scholes option pricing model was
$19 (December 31, 2014 - $24).</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 24px">
<div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: 
inline">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 24px">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: 
inline">(c)</font></div>
</td>
<td width="1432">
<div align="justify">
<div align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
DISPLAY: inline">Public Offering</font></font></div>
</div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman; DISPLAY: inline">On March 12, 2014, the Company closed a public offering 
and issued 74,290,000 units consisting of one common share of the Company 
(&#8220;Share&#8221;) and one half of one common share purchase warrant 
(&#8220;Warrant&#8221;) at a price of $1.55 per unit 
(&#8220;Unit&#8221;)</font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
<div id="PGBRK" style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-
INDENT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="center"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">-&#160;<font 
style="FONT-STYLE: normal">18 </font></font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; 
DISPLAY: inline">-</font></font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
</div>
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160; </font></div>
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160; </font></div>
<div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">RUBICON MINERALS CORPORATION</font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Notes to the Consolidated Financial Statements 
(Unaudited)</font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">June 30, 2015 and 2014</font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">(in Canadian Dollars, in thousands except 
for share data)</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; 
DISPLAY: inline">16.</font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">SHARE CAPITAL <font style="FONT-STYLE: 
italic; DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: 
normal">(continued)</font></font></font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">for total gross proceeds of $115,150.&#160;&#160;Each whole 
Warrant gives the holder the right to purchase one Share in the Company for a 
price of $2.00 per Share.&#160;&#160;The proceeds are inclusive of an 
overallotment option which was fully exercised on closing.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Unit issuance costs were $7,672 including an 
underwriter&#8217;s commission of 5% of the gross proceeds.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times 
New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">Proceeds and related issue costs of the offering 
have been allocated between Share Capital and Warrant Reserve based on the pro-
rata value of the underlying share and half warrant of the unit.&#160;&#160;For 
the purposes of this allocation a share value on closing of the offering of 
$1.52 a Share and a Black-Scholes calculated value of $0.175 for each half 
Warrant were used. The assumptions used to value the Warrant include an expected
life of one year, 81.5% volatility, a risk free rate of 1.04% and expected 
dividends of $nil.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">The Warrants expired on March 12, 2015 
unexercised.&#160;&#160;Upon expiration $11,097 was transferred from the Warrant
Reserve to Contributed Surplus.</font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 23px">
<div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: 
inline">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 25px">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: 
inline">(d)</font></div>
</td>
<td width="1432">
<div align="justify">
<div align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
DISPLAY: inline">July 2014 Flow-Through Share Offering</font></font></div>
</div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times 
New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">On July 23, 2014, the Company closed a public flow-
through share offering of 7,060,000 common shares on a &#8220;flow-
through&#8221; basis under the Income Tax Act (Canada) at a price of $1.70 per 
flow-through share for aggregate gross proceeds of $12,002. $10,943 was recorded
in share capital and the remaining $1,059 representing the implied premium was 
recorded as flow-through share premium liability. In connection with the 
offering, the Company incurred share issuance costs of $757 including an 
underwriter&#8217;s commission representing 5% of the gross proceeds. As at 
December 31, 2014, the Company had spent the full gross proceeds of the offering
of $12,002 on eligible expenditures and the full amount of the flow-through 
share premium liability has been reversed. The expenditures were renounced to 
investors in February 2015 with an effective renunciation date of December 31, 
2014.</font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 24px">
<div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: 
inline">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 24px">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: 
inline">(e)</font></div>
</td>
<td width="1432">
<div align="justify">
<div align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
DISPLAY: inline">April 2015 Flow-Through Share Offering</font></font></div>
</div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">On April 9, 2015, the Company closed a public flow-through 
share offering of 23,600,000 common shares on a &#8220;flow-through&#8221; basis
under the <font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">Income Tax 
Act</font> (Canada) at a price of $1.28 per flow-through share for aggregate 
gross proceeds of $30,208.&#160;&#160;$28,635 was recorded in share capital and 
the remaining $1,573, representing the implied premium, was recorded as flow-
through share premium liability (Note 13).&#160;&#160;In connection with the 
offering, the Company incurred share issuance costs of $2,049 including an 
underwriter&#8217;s commission representing 5% of the gross 
proceeds.&#160;&#160;As at June 30, 2015, the Company estimates it has spent 
$23,255 on eligible expenditures.&#160;&#160;The Company expects the full amount
of the offering will be renounced to investors with an effective renunciation 
date of December 31, 2015.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 24px">
<div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: 
inline">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 24px">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: 
inline">(f)</font></div>
</td>
<td width="1432">
<div align="justify">
<div align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Long-Term Incentive Plan</font></font></div>
</div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">In January 2015 the Company granted 506,767 
RSUs.&#160;&#160;The amortized value of the RSUs at June 30, 2015 was $203 
(December 31, 2014 - $nil).&#160;&#160;During the three and six months ended 
June 30, 2015, the Company recorded share-based payments expense, related to the
RSUs, of $116 and $182 (June 30, 2014 - $nil), in addition, share-based payments
of $21 (June 30, 2014 - $nil) were capitalized to exploration and evaluation 
assets.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 18pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">In January 2015 the Company granted 1,480,263 
PSUs.&#160;&#160;The amortized value of the PSUs at June 30, 2015 was $859 
(December 31, 2014 - $nil).&#160;&#160;During the three and six months ended 
June 30, 2015, the Company recorded share-based payments expense related to the 
PSUs of $426 and $704 (June 30, 2014 - $nil), in addition, share-based payments 
of $155 (June 30, 2014 - $nil) were capitalized to exploration and evaluation 
assets.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">

</td>

<td align="left" valign="bottom" width="1%"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-

<td valign="bottom" width="1%" style="TEXT-ALIGN: left"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; DISPLAY: inline">$</font></td>
<td valign="bottom" width="12%" style="TEXT-ALIGN: right"><font style="FONT-

<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
<div align="center">
<table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="hangingindent" 
width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 24px">
<div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; DISPLAY: 
inline">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td valign="top" style="WIDTH: 24px">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; DISPLAY: 
inline">(b)</font></div>
</td>
<td width="1432">
<div align="justify">
<div align="justify">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt" 
align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; 
DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; 
DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; 
DISPLAY: inline">The Company is required to make certain cash payments, incur 
exploration costs and pay certain advance royalty amounts to maintain its 
mineral properties in good standing.&#160;&#160;These payments and costs are at 
the Company&#8217;s discretion and are based upon available financial resources 
and the exploration merits of the mineral properties which are evaluated on a 
periodic basis.</font></font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 24px">
<div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: 
inline">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 24px">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: 
inline">(c)</font></div>
</td>
<td width="1432">
<div align="justify">
<div align="justify">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt" 
align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
DISPLAY: inline">In February 2015 the Company entered into certain agreements 
necessary to secure the remaining electric grid power requirements for the 
Phoenix Gold Project once it enters production.&#160;&#160;The cost to the 
Company as a result of these agreements is dependent on a number of factors
including the cost to construct the required power line 
upgrades.</font></font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-
RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times 
New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">As of June 30, 2015 the estimated cost of these 
agreements, in excess of amounts accrued and as described in Note 13 - 
Provisions and Other Liabilities, is estimated to be between $2,700 and 
$16,500.&#160;&#160;The balance remains unaccrued as it is contingent on 
uncertain future events.</font></div>
</div>
</div>

</tr><tr bgcolor="white">

</div>
<br>
<div id="PGBRK" style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-
INDENT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="center"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
DISPLAY: inline">-2-</font></div>
</div>
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160; </font></div>
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">INTRODUCTION</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">This Management Discussion and Analysis (&#8220;<font 
style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">MD&amp;A</font>&#8221;), dated August
13, 2015, includes financial information from, and should be read in conjunction
with, the consolidated financial statements for the second quarter ended June 
30, 2015.&#160;&#160;It is further assumed that the reader has access to the 
audited consolidated financial statements for the year ended December 31, 2014 
and the accompanying MD&amp;A for the year ended December 31, 
2014.&#160;&#160;Please refer to the cautionary notices at the end of this 
MD&amp;A, especially in regard to forward-looking statements.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Rubicon Minerals Corporation (&#8220;<font style="FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold; DISPLAY: inline">Rubicon</font>&#8221;<font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; 
DISPLAY: inline">&#160;</font>or the &#8220;<font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; 
DISPLAY: inline">Company</font>&#8221;) reports its financial position, 
statement of comprehensive loss, changes in equity and cash flows in accordance 
with International Financial Reporting Standards (&#8220;<font style="FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">IFRS</font>&#8221;) in Canadian 
dollars.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Rubicon is a Canadian-based company that has been primarily 
involved in the acquisition, exploration and development of mineral property 
interests in Canada and the United States. The Company&#8217;s key asset is the 
Phoenix Gold Project (hereinafter defined) located in the Red Lake gold camp, in
the Province of Ontario. In addition, the Company has significant land packages 
in the Red Lake area outside the Phoenix Gold Project and other significant land
packages in Nevada and Utah, United States. The Company does not have any assets
or mineral properties that are in commercial production or that contain a 
reserve.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">The Company is a reporting issuer in all the provinces of 
Canada as well as with the Securities and Exchange Commission (&#8220;<font 
style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">SEC</font>&#8221;) in the United 
States. The Company&#8217;s common shares trade on the Toronto Stock Exchange 
(&#8220;<font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">TSX</font>&#8221;) in 
Canada under the symbol &#8216;<font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: 
inline">RMX</font>&#8217; and on the NYSE MKT Exchange in the United States 
under the symbol &#8216;<font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: 
inline">RBY</font>&#8217;.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">DEFINITIONS</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">The following terms are used in this MD&amp;A:</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: 
inline">&#8220;</font><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic; 
DISPLAY: inline">F2 Gold System</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: 
inline">&#8221;</font> is a gold mineralized system located at the Phoenix Gold 
Property composed of high-grade gold mineralization and a lower grade sulphide-
rich zone, which currently has a strike length of approximately 1,200 m (3,937 
ft) and a depth extent of 1,650 m (5,413 ft) below surface and remains open 
along strike and at depth. The system appears to at least partly correlate with 
a large Titan-24 chargeability anomaly. The anomaly extends laterally from the 
F2 Gold System for over 1,500 m (approximately 5,000 ft) and to depths up to 750
m (approximately 2,500 ft) &#8211; the current depth limit of the survey. As for
the setting and style of this zone, it is similar in many respects to the high-
grade zones present at the nearby Red Lake Gold Mines. The F2 Gold System is 420
m southeast of the existing shaft and is entirely independent from the previous 
gold resource of the McFinley Gold Deposit.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: 
inline">&#8220;</font><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic; 
DISPLAY: inline">PEA</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: 
inline">&#8221;</font> means the amended and restated National Instrument 43-101
technical report titled &#8220;<font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: 
inline">Preliminary Economic Assessment for the F2 Gold System, Phoenix Gold 
Project, Red Lake, Ontario&#8221;</font>, prepared by SRK Consulting (Canada) 
Inc., dated effective June 25, 2013 and filed on SEDAR on February 28, 
2014.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">&#8220;<font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic; 
DISPLAY: inline">Phoenix Gold Project</font>&#8221; The Phoenix Gold Project is 
the construction, development, and commissioning of an underground gold mine and
mill located on the Phoenix Gold Property, as described in the Phoenix Project 
Closure Plan that was filed in December 2011 pursuant to the <font style="FONT-
STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">Mining Act </font>(Ontario).</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: 
inline">&#8220;</font><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; FONT-STYLE: italic; 
DISPLAY: inline">Phoenix Gold Property</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; 
DISPLAY: inline">&#8221; </font>is the property containing the Phoenix Gold 
Project located in Bateman Township, Municipality of Red Lake, Ontario, 
Canada,</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">
<div id="PGBRK" style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-
INDENT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="center"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
DISPLAY: inline">-3-</font></div>
</div>
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160; </font></div>
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">
<hr style="COLOR: black" noshade size="2">
</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160; </font></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
&#160;</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">COMPANY OVERVIEW AND STRATEGY</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Rubicon is an emerging potential gold producer, focused on the 
responsible and environmentally sustainable development of its Phoenix Gold 
Project in Red Lake, Ontario. Rubicon has commenced initial gold production at 
the Phoenix Gold Project and is fully permitted for potential production to 
1,250 tonnes per day. In addition, Rubicon controls over 100 square miles of 
prime exploration ground in the prolific Red Lake gold district and 
approximately 350 square miles of mineral property interests located in the 
emerging Long Canyon gold district that straddles the Nevada-Utah border in the 
United States. Rubicon&#8217;s common shares are listed on the NYSE MKT (RBY) 
and on the Toronto Stock Exchange (RMX).</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Rubicon has substantially completed the construction of surface
and mill infrastructure at its 100%-wholly owned Phoenix Gold Project in Red 
Lake, Ontario, and is currently in a trial stoping phase.&#160;&#160;Between 
October 1, 2013 and June 30, 2015, the Company has spent approximately $426 
million on the construction and development of the Phoenix Gold 
Project.&#160;&#160;In 2013, the Company delivered an improved updated mineral 
resource estimate, with indicated resources totaling 1.129 million ounces of 
gold based on 4.12 million tonnes grading 8.52 grams per tonne of gold 
(&#8220;<font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">g/t Au</font>&#8221;) 
and inferred resources totaling 2.219 million ounces of gold based on 7.45 
million tonnes grading 9.26 g/t Au. In June 2015, the Company announced the 
first gold pour from the Phoenix Gold Project.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">The Company delivered a positive PEA with an effective date of 
June 25, 2013 and an issue date of February 28, 2014. In the PEA, the Phoenix 
Gold Project would potentially generate an after-tax internal rate of return 
(&#8220;<font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">IRR</font>&#8221;) and 
net present value (&#8220;<font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: 
inline">NPV</font>&#8221;) of 27% and $531.0 million, respectively, based on a 
gold price assumption of US $1,385 per ounce, and a CAD/USD exchange rate of 
1.05:1.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Since the Company released the Preliminary Economic Assessment 
in 2013, Rubicon has conducted and completed a number of technical studies 
including a study assessing the crown pillar, a study and analysis of the 
results from a 38,000-metre infill and definition drilling program in the upper 
levels of the deposit, and a study and analysis of chip and muck samples
collected from stope development. Considerable additional information will be 
collected on ground support, stoping methods and practices, dilution, and drill 
patterns during the trial stoping phase.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Rubicon&#8217;s strategy is to become a mid-tier gold producer,
to increase the mineral resources through further exploration at its Phoenix 
Gold Project, and its extensive Red Lake holdings, and unlocking the value of 
its Nevada-Utah land packages.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; DISPLAY: 
inline">HIGHLIGHTS</font></font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">Phoenix Gold Project &#8211; Construction 
and Development Highlights</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Phoenix Gold Project milestones include:</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: 
inline">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline"><font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; DISPLAY: inline" face="Symbol, 
serif">&#183;</font></font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">The Phoenix Gold Project successfully poured its first 
dor&#233; bar containing 742 gold ounces in June 2015.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: 
inline">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline"><font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; DISPLAY: inline" face="Symbol, 
serif">&#183;</font></font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">The construction and the commissioning of the mill circuit is 
complete. Rubicon processed waste and low-grade mineralized material during the 
commissioning phase of the mill.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" 
id="hangingindent" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new 
roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
<td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<div><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: 
inline">&#160; </font></div>
</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;</font></font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">The Company completed the initial 8,023 m of planned 
underground development (both lateral and vertical) prior to the start of 
projected initial production. Rubicon has commenced trial stoping on the 244- 
and 305-metre levels from the initial two test stopes. The Company&#8217;s main 
objective is to optimize the stoping method and establish best stoping practices
in a controlled environment before increasing tonnage towards permitted 
capacity. The Company is also developing five stopes which are planned for 
future stoping.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt">&#160;</div>

</div>
<br>
</div>
<div>

</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div>
<table align="center" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"

<td style="WIDTH: 18pt">

</td>
<td style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font 
style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline"><font 
style="DISPLAY: inline" face="Symbol, serif">&#183;</font></font></div>
</td>
<td>
<div align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">All surface and on-site construction is substantially 
complete.</font></div>
</td>
</tr></table>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">Construction and Development Update and 
Outlook</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Rubicon has substantially completed the initial construction of
surface and mill infrastructure at the Phoenix Gold Project.&#160;&#160;The 
project capital cost spent to June 30, 2015 at the Phoenix Gold Project was 
approximately $426 million. The Company has completed the commissioning phase of
the mill and has commenced trial stoping and is progressing with ongoing 
underground development and infrastructure construction.&#160;&#160;Rubicon 
estimates that approximately $26 million of sustaining capital is required for 
the remainder of 2015 on underground development and underground infrastructure 
construction. Declaration of commercial production will be primarily based on 
achieving an average throughput of 70% of 1,250 tonnes per day (&#8220;<font 
style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">tpd</font>&#8221;) or 875 tpd for at 
least 60 consecutive days.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">Exploration</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Rubicon has completed 9,553 metres (&#8220;<font style="FONT-
WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">m</font>&#8221;) in 21 holes of surface 
exploration drilling that focused on target areas located within a one-kilometre
radius north of ongoing underground development at the Project.&#160;&#160;This 
program revisits the high-grade intercepts discovered from previous drilling on
the Carbonate Zone (&#8220;<font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: 
inline">CARZ</font>&#8221;), as well as commencing an initial wide-spaced 
drilling program to test the northern extension of the F2 deposit. The 
highlighted assay results (previously unpublished) from exploration drilling 
include:</font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">CARZ Hanging Wall</font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify">

<div>&#160;</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Details of historical drilling results are available on the 
Company&#8217;s web site at <font style="TEXT-DECORATION: underline; DISPLAY: 
inline">www.rubiconminerals.com</font>.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Further drilling of the F2 Gold System North is warranted in 
the long-term, once Rubicon is in a positive cash flow position. Future drilling
programs will infill the high-grade gold intersections and test the down-plunge 
continuity of the CARZ, which remains open to depth. It will also continue to 
test high-interest areas within the F2 Gold System regional trend.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: 
inline">THE PEA</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 1pt; FONT-FAMILY: ZWAdobeF; 
DISPLAY: inline">1</font></font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">On June 25, 2013 the Company announced positive results and 
highlights from a preliminary economic assessment&#160;and an updated mineral 
resource estimate completed by SRK for the F2 Gold System, </font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify">
<div id="PGBRK" style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-
INDENT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">
<div style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left">
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline"><br>
</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline"><br>
</font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="center"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
DISPLAY: inline">-5-</font></font></div>
</div>
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160; </font></font></div>
</div>
<div id="PN" style="WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-
FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; FONT-

<div style="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: center">

</div>
</div>
<div id="HDR">
<div id="GLHDR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="right"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt; 
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; DISPLAY: inline">&#160; </font></font></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">&#160;</font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">which comprises part of the Company&#8217;s flagship Phoenix 
Gold Project, located in Red Lake, Ontario. A technical report documenting the 
preliminary economic assessment was filed on SEDAR on August 9, 2013 in 
accordance with the requirements of National Instrument 43-101 <font 
style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">S</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: 
italic; DISPLAY: inline">tand</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: 
inline">a</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">r</font><font 
style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">ds</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: 
italic; DISPLAY: inline">&#160;</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: 
inline">of </font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: 
inline">D</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">i</font><font 
style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">s</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: 
italic; DISPLAY: inline">c</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY:
inline">lo</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">s</font><font
style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">u</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: 
italic; DISPLAY: inline">r</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: 
inline">e</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: 
inline">&#160;</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: 
inline">for</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: 
inline">&#160;</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY:

style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">e</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: 
italic; DISPLAY: inline">r</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: 
inline">al </font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: 
inline">P</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">r</font><font 
style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">oj</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: 
italic; DISPLAY: inline">e</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: 
inline">c</font><font style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">ts</font><font
style="FONT-STYLE: italic; DISPLAY: inline">&#160;</font>(&#8220;<font 
style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">N</font><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: 
bold; DISPLAY: inline">I</font><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: 
inline">&#160;</font><font style="FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">43-
101</font>&#8221;). The preliminary economic assessment filed on August 9, 2013 
was superseded in full by the PEA dated effective June 25, 2013 and filed on 
SEDAR on February 28, 2014. The report can be viewed at <font style="TEXT-
DECORATION: underline; DISPLAY: inline">www.sedar.com</font>, <font style="TEXT-
DECORATION: underline; DISPLAY: inline">www.sec.gov/edgar.shtml</font> and the 
Company&#8217;s website at <font style="TEXT-DECORATION: underline; DISPLAY: 
inline">www.rubiconminerals.com</font>. The summary below does not take into 
account the review by the Company of planned construction 
schedules.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">Updated Phoenix Gold Project Mineral 
Resource Estimate Highlights:</font></div>
<div>&#160;</div>
<div align="center">

gold in 4.12 million tonnes grading 8.52 g/t Au using a 4.0 g/t Au cut-off 
grade;</font></font></div>
</td>

</div>
<div>&#160;</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 163.2pt; TEXT-
INDENT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times 
New Roman; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">Recommendation from SRK and 
Continuing Studies</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">SRK determined that the results of the PEA support the 
continued advancement of the Phoenix Gold Project and work related to further 
technical studies. No production decision was made at the time of filing of the 
PEA. SRK concluded that such a decision, if reached, would require additional 
technical studies and ongoing evaluation by Rubicon of the construction and 
development of the Phoenix Gold Project and would not be based solely on the 
PEA.</font></div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="left"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; 
FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; DISPLAY: 
inline">ABORIGINAL CONSULTATIONS</font></font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Consultations are ongoing with local First Nation and 
M&#233;tis communities.</font></div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div>
<div style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 
0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New 
Roman; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">O</font><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt;
FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-WEIGHT: bold; DISPLAY: inline">THER RED LAKE 
PROJECTS</font></div>
</div>
<div style="DISPLAY: block; TEXT-INDENT: 0pt"><br>
</div>
<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 
0pt" align="justify"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman;
DISPLAY: inline">Rubicon holds approximately 100 square miles of additional 
mineral claims in the Red Lake area which were acquired for their high 
geological potential to host gold mineralization. Due to the Company&#8217;s 
focus on developing the Phoenix Gold Project, exploration of these additional 
properties has been deferred to a future date, however, the Company considers 
these projects to be of strategic importance for future exploration. The Company
is continuing the geological compilation studies on several of its Red Lake 
projects to identify targets for future exploration programs.</font><br>
</div>
<br>
<div id="PGBRK" style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-
INDENT: 0pt">
<div id="FTR">

<div style="MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT:

DISPLAY: inline">-6-</font></div>
</div>
<div id="GLFTR" style="WIDTH: 100%" align="left"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 8pt;

<div id="PN" style="WIDTH: 100%; PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
